item.title: Python/R Reticulate Post
item.description: Let’s look at some Python and R code, and see how they interact with the reticulate package! library(reticulate) depth <- quakes$depth mag <- quakes$mag stations <- quakes$stations hist(stations) Let’s pass the magnitude and depth data that we obtained in R to python and make a histogram from it! import matplotlib.pyplot as plt #your code here plt.hist(r.depth) ## (array([263., 112., 104., 64., 33., 42., 36., 118., 167., 61.]), array([ 40.
